javadoc:
Class to represent the result state of a GTask, such as whether it was cancelled or an exception
 happened.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a GTaskResult for a completed GTask with an optional exception.

params.name: group
params.comment: The GTaskGroup that the completed GTask belonged to.

params.name: task
params.comment: the GScheduledTask which contains the actual GTask that has completed.

params.name: e
params.comment:
optional exception recorded if an exception occurred while processing the task.  If
 the task was cancelled, there should be a CancelledException passed in here.

params.name: transactionID
params.comment:
The transaction id for the transaction that was open when the task was
 executed.  Used by the results GUI to indicate when transactions are opened and closed between
 tasks.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a description of the task that was run.
@return a description of the task that was run.
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a description of the task that was run.

return.comment: a description of the task that was run.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if the task for this result was cancelled.
@return true if the task for this result was cancelled.
methods.name: wasCancelled
methods.comment: Returns true if the task for this result was cancelled.

return.comment: true if the task for this result was cancelled.

methods.name: getException
methods.comment:
Returns the exception generated by the task, or null if no exception was generated.  If 
 the task was cancelled, this will return a CancelledException.

return.comment: the exception generated by this task or null.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the priority at which the task was run within its group.
@return the priority at which the task was run within its group.
methods.name: getPriority
methods.comment: Returns the priority at which the task was run within its group.

return.comment: the priority at which the task was run within its group.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the description for the group for which this task belonged.
@return the description for the group for which this task belonged.
methods.name: getGroupDescription
methods.comment: Returns the description for the group for which this task belonged.

return.comment: the description for the group for which this task belonged.

methods.name: hasSameTransaction
methods.comment:
Returns true if the task represented by this result was executed in the same transaction
 as the task represented by the given GTaskResult.

params.name: result
params.comment:
the result to check if it was executed in the same transaction as this task
 result.

name: GTaskResult
comment:
Class to represent the result state of a GTask, such as whether it was cancelled or an exception
 happened.
